name: The Butterfly Effect (randomTeam)
description:
The Butterfly Effect

Lead the chaos butterfly to shelter from the madness of obstacles in its path

Collecti several butterfly friends on their journey to complete  the level.

Do not hesitate and stay alert at all time.

We hope you have fun and have an entertaining time.

We made this game for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 with  the theme: “LET THERE BE CHAOS”.

Thinking about the topic comes to my mind the Chinese proverb of "the flapping of the wings of a butterfly can be felt on the other side of the world" concept of the physical theory "the butterfly effect" referring to the theory of chaos.

This game has been made in collaboration with my good friend Kike in charge with the design and I, Eduardo, doing the programming work

We hope you like it, let us know in the commentary box what you think about the game.

CONTROLS

A key – Move Left

D key – Move Right

LEFT KEY – Move Left

RIGHT KEY - Move Right

LEFT CLICK - Jump

SPACE BAR – Jump
